Summary: 11 small craft going west to east then north turn followed by big craft
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving huff gas station on the corner of i85\40 and hwy 49 i saw what looked like small lights passing in the twilight they where flying west to east then turned due north and vanished. 3 seconds later a large one following the same path came by this one had what looked like 3 square glowing windows on front then turned north and vanished
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Burlington
There was one other sighting in Burlington on or around July 26th 2012
